verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD בִּשְׁלֹ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> sent אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> when הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> when king צִדְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּשְׁחוּר֙ <S%H6583><s%> unto him Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֔ה <S%H4441><s%> of Melchiah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צְפַנְיָ֧ה <S%H6846><s%> and Zephaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <S%H4641><s%> of Maaseiah הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דְּרָשׁ־ <S%H1875><s%> Enquire נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please בַעֲדֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H1157><s%> for us אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> I pray thee of the LORD כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> for Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon נִלְחָ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> maketh war עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against אוּלַי֩ <S%H194><s%> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> will deal יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> against us if so be that the LORD אוֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H854><s%> according כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all נִפְלְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H6381><s%> with us according to all his wondrous works וְיַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> that he may go up מֵעָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> as כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> follows תֹאמְרֻ֖ן <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H6667><s%> to Zedekiah

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am about מֵסֵב֮ <S%H5437><s%> Behold I will turn back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> the weapons הַמִּלְחָמָה֮ <S%H4421><s%> of war אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיֶדְכֶם֒ <S%H3027><s%> that [are] in your hands אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֜ם <S%H859><s%> you נִלְחָמִ֣ים <S%H3898><s%> wherewith ye fight בָּ֗ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> and [against] the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֣ים <S%H6696><s%> which besiege עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> you without לַֽחוֹמָ֑ה <S%H2346><s%> the walls וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <S%H622><s%> and I will assemble אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> them into the midst הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וְנִלְחַמְתִּ֤י <S%H3898><s%> And I myself will fight אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> Myself אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> against בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand נְטוּיָ֖ה <S%H5186><s%> against you with an outstretched וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm חֲזָקָ֑ה <S%H2389><s%> and with a strong וּבְאַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> even in anger וּבְחֵמָ֖ה <S%H2534><s%> and in fury וּבְקֶ֥צֶף <S%H7110><s%> wrath גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> and in great

וְהִכֵּיתִ֗י <S%H5221><s%> And I will smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> both man וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and beast בְּדֶ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> pestilence גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of a great יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> they shall die

וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And afterward כֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֣יו ׀ <S%H5650><s%> and his servants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֡ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֩ <S%H7604><s%> and such as are left בָּעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַדֶּ֣בֶר ׀ <S%H1698><s%> from the pestilence מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> from the sword וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָרָעָ֗ב <S%H7458><s%> and from the famine בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וּבְיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> of their enemies וּבְיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand מְבַקְשֵׁ֣י <S%H1245><s%> of those that seek נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> their life וְהִכָּ֣ם <S%H5221><s%> and he shall smite לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> them with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָח֣וּס <S%H2347><s%> he shall not spare עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַחְמֹ֖ל <S%H2550><s%> them neither have pity וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְרַחֵֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> nor have mercy

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> And unto this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> to this תֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> thou shalt say כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵן֙ <S%H5414><s%> Behold I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> you the way הַחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> of life וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and the way הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> He that abideth בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יָמ֕וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> and by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence וְהַיּוֹצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> but he that goeth out וְנָפַ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> and falleth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הַכַּשְׂדִּ֜ים <S%H3778><s%> to the Chaldeans הַצָּרִ֤ים <S%H6696><s%> that besiege עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and [יִחְיֶה כ] (וְחָיָ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> keep leave ק) וְהָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> will have לּ֥וֹ נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> and his life לְשָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> shall be unto him for a prey

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> For I have set פָ֠נַי <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> against this city הַזֹּ֧את <S%H2063><s%> for לְרָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> for evil וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> for לְטוֹבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> and not for good נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon תִּנָּתֵ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> it shall be given וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <S%H8313><s%> and he shall burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> it with fire ס

וּלְבֵית֙ <S%H1004><s%> And touching the house מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> [say] Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> ye the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O house דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD דִּ֤ינוּ <S%H1777><s%> Execute לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וְהַצִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5337><s%> and deliver גָז֖וּל <S%H1497><s%> [him that is] spoiled מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand עוֹשֵׁ֑ק <S%H6231><s%> of the oppressor פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> may not תֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> go out כָאֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> like fire חֲמָתִ֗י <S%H2534><s%> lest my fury וּבָעֲרָה֙ <S%H1197><s%> and burn וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> none מְכַבֶּ֔ה <S%H3518><s%> that none can quench מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> [it] because רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> of the evil [מַעַלְלֵיהֶם כ] (מַעַלְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> doing ק)

הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֵלַ֜יִךְ <S%H413><s%> I am against יֹשֶׁ֧בֶת <S%H3427><s%> Behold I [am] against thee O inhabitant הָעֵ֛מֶק <S%H6010><s%> of the valley צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> [and] rock הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <S%H4334><s%> of the plain נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> which say מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יֵחַ֣ת <S%H5181><s%> Who shall come down עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> against וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> against us? or who shall enter בִּמְעוֹנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H4585><s%> den

וּפָקַדְתִּ֧י <S%H6485><s%> But I will punish עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> according כִּפְרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> you according to the fruit מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> of your doings נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <S%H3341><s%> and I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּיַעְרָ֔הּ <S%H3293><s%> in the forest וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> thereof and it shall devour כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all סְבִיבֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5439><s%> all things round about ס
